title: Spoon, 1985-103-245, n.d.
markings: On handle: Coat of Arms of Amsterdam, I , Amsterdam, 1598 ; Goblet: unidentified maker's mark, 1597 see: Voet, Elias Jr., MERKEN VAN AMSTERDAMSE GOUD EN ZILVERSMEDEN, Den Haag, 1912/66
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Large fig-shaped spoon bowl, flat flaring neck. Scrolled decoration on front with a lion's head in the centre. Long plain handle, round in sectionon top of handle a soldier standing on a pedestal holding a rifle.
